thread.title: Man United D Matteo Darmian’s first international goal (video)
thread.title_full: Man United D Matteo Darmian’s first international goal (video)

author: paulmbanks
title: Man United D Matteo Darmian’s first international goal (video)
text:
Manchester United right back Matteo Darmian scored his first ever goal in international competition today. The long range scoring strike helped Italy defeat Azerbaijan 3-1 in the Euro 2016 Qualifiers. 
Take a look at the footage below: Matteo Darmian scoring his first ever goal for the Italian ?? National Team! What a goal #MUFC pic.twitter.com/VrbKgqepjy 
— Manchester United (@ManUtds_News) October 10, 2015 
Darmian converted from 24 yards out. It was a great interception and finish. Obviously, scoring is definitely not Darmian’s game, but it’s great to see his versatility on display here. Darmian and his United teammates return to Premier League play versus Everton a week from today.
